text: He who feeds you, control you.
author: Thomas Sankara

text: While revolutionaries as individuals can be murdered, you cannot kill the ideas.
author: Thomas Sankara

text: We must unite now or perish.
author: Kwame Nkrumah

text: We face neither East nor West; we face forward.
author: Thomas Sankara

text: History lives in the minds and bodies of people.
author: Dr. Amos N. Wilson

text: It can be done. Play your part.
author: Julius Nyrere

text: Africa for the African, those at home and those abroad.
author: Marcus Mosiah Garvey
